channel.title: Need Help
channel.description:
Ok guys. I need help with the following things:
A. How do I add spawns of items?(What Folder, What Code?) B. How do I add NPC's. When I try to, it says there's an exeption when i runserver. How do I make it work? C. How Do I add commands? D. How do I make messages that have my server name and not the source name? (What Folder, what code?) E. How do I add a Mod Island? F. How do I make Shops work? When I do, like NPC's, it says exception in --- when I runserver. G. How do I make NPC's Speak? What Code, what folder) If you can all help me, I'd appreciate it! :confused:

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

G: Modify NPChanlder.java, open it and search for “moo”, look and understand text and coding like that, you should lift off…

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Coltfan106 Coltfan106
item.description:
@Coltfan106 wrote:

Ok guys. I need help with the following things:

A. How do I add spawns of items?(What Folder, What Code?)
B. How do I add NPC’s. When I try to, it says there’s an exeption when i runserver. How do I make it work?
C. How Do I add commands?
D. How do I make messages that have my server name and not the source name? (What Folder, what code?)
E. How do I add a Mod Island?
F. How do I make Shops work? When I do, like NPC’s, it says exception in — when I runserver.
G. How do I make NPC’s Speak? What Code, what folder)
If you can all help me, I’d appreciate it!
